title: Light-Filled, Open Floor Plans, Full-Size Washer/Dryer in Every Home
posting_body: ['The Prescott at Concord', '1 Nathan Pratt Drive, Concord, MA, 01742', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', '(978) 592-7573 x 9', 'OR Text', '9', 'to', '(978) 592-7573', 'to text with us.', 'Sun filled apartments in quiet community', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 975 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'When it comes to apartment rentals in The Prescott at Concord, there’s really just one choice.', 'With our one-, two- and three-bedroom apartment and town home floor plans, you will surely find a space that suits your needs.', 'Whether you want to play, relax, or gather with friends,The Prescott at Concord Apartments provide countless options with uncommon community amenities at every turn.', 'Relax beside a sparkling pool, enjoy the warmth of an outdoor fire pit or play a game of bocce ball as you unwind after a day of work.', 'Enjoy the perks of life at a residential community that offers a bark park, children’s playgrounds, and private garages and storage spaces.', 'Pricing and availability are subject to change.', 'Features', '- Smoke-Free Community', '- Two Story Townhomes with Attached Garages', '- Spacious Walk-In Shower with Rainfall Showerhead', '- Rentable Attached Garages Available', '- Full-Size Washer/Dryer in Every Home', "- Custom Cherry or Bird's Eye Maple Cabinets", '- Panoramic Picture Windows and Wooded Views', '- Light-Filled, Open Floor Plans', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', '- Granite Countertops', '- Wood Finished Flooring in Kitchen and Foyer', '- Optional Den or Loft with Volume Ceiling', '- Expansive Balcony or Patio', '- Free Outdoor Parking', "- Chef's Island and Gas Cooking", 'Community Amenities', '- Outdoor Fire Pit', '- 2 Playgrounds', '- Business Center with iPad, Mac, and PC Workstations', '- Four Terraced Grilling Areas', '- Private Garages and Storage Spaces', '- Yoga/Barre Studio', '- Minutes to Concord and West Concord T Stations', '- Fitness Studio', '- Bark Park', '- Wi-Fi Enabled Resident Lounge with Entertainment Kitchen, Billiards and Gaming', '- Highly Sought-After Address in Premier School District', '- Private Community Swimming Pool with Sundeck', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'Pet rent is $65 for dogs and $50 for cats.', 'Maximum allowed weight is 100lbs.', 'Please call for complete pet policy information.', 'Income Requirements:', 'This apartment is part of the Massachusetts 40B Affordable Program.', 'Participant must meet income requirements.', 'Minimum Annual Income', '1BR- $42,000', '2BR- $46,536', '3BR- $51,096', 'Maximum Annual Gross Income Limit', 'Household Size:', '1 Person Household: $70,750', '2 Person Household: $80,850', '3 Person Household: $90,950', '4 Person Household: $101,050', '5 Person Household: $109,150', '6 Person Household: $117,250', '1aRKlYWnJ3nl']
